title: $1050, private room in sunny, renovated Porter sq. 3BR, 2Ba unit
posting_body: ['Hello!', 'This is a private room in the beautiful, convenient Porter sq. neighborhood.', 'One of our roommates is leaving at the end of the summer to start her PhD and we are looking for a replacement for September 1, 2022.', 'The apartment is an interesting 4 story layout, with your potential room being on the 3rd level.', 'It is newly renovated, has a ton of great amenities (central AC & heating, full size washer & dryer, an attached garage for storage, gas stove, etc.).', 'You will be sharing a bathroom with the other roommate (M) who is an early 30s IT administrator.', 'I (F) am a mid-20s program manager.', "The common spaces are all fully furnished, and all of these items will be staying for next year so you don't have to provide any furniture.", 'If you have a car there is plenty of street parking, or you can negotiate how to split the garage with our other roommate (I only have a bike).', 'We have a porch attached to the living room as well.', 'The landlord lives in the building right next door and is very responsive.', 'We are about a 7 minute walk to the Porter sq.', 'stop on the red line, 9 minutes to Star Market & Target, 12 minutes to Davis Sq., and maybe 20 minutes to Harvard sq.', 'Danehy Park is literally 5 minutes away, and the area itself feels like a peaceful, residential neighborhood.', 'I was considering moving into my own place next year but ended up liking this apartment and the area too much to leave.', 'No broker fee.', 'No security deposit.', "Just first month's rent to move-in.", 'The landlords own the building already so they are pretty chill with the application process.', 'My current roommate and myself are looking for someone who is clean, friendly, has their own things going on, and views their space as a home.', "We both like outdoorsy activities and don't throw any major house parties here.", 'Having friends over occasionally is totally fine, we are just considerate with the sharing of common spaces.', 'We both also travel a bit for work so there may be periods where no one is home.', 'Couple specifics we are looking for in a roommate:', "- We would prefer a guy because the roommate you're sharing the bathroom with is a dude", '- Both of us currently work from home full time so we would prefer someone who does not work from home', '- We have a monthly cleaning rotation for the common spaces (living room & kitchen) and would prefer someone who likes their living environment clean as well.', 'The pictures for example were not staged for this post, this is just how it generally looks.', '- No pets', '- No smoking', "If you're interested please feel free to email me and we can have a brief chat.", "I will be traveling most of the rest of July, but we're hoping to do some tours starting in August."]
